summary: The Crop Insurance for Future Farmers Act amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to promote crop insurance support for beginning and veteran farmers and ranchers. It extends the definition of a beginning farmer/rancher and veteran farmer/rancher from 5 to 10 crop years. The bill also increases assistance by adjusting percentage points for reinsurance years. Specifically, it specifies percentage point adjustments for the first ten reinsurance years of participation in the program. Finally, it makes a conforming amendment to the Federal Crop Insurance Act.
